title: Polished
description: When you’re a divorce lawyer, nothing is more terrifying than marital problems, especially when they involve your husband thinking the ability to mind-read translates into unconditional love. Daniel Bishop calls his old roommate for help– Kaden Marx loves nothing more than running to someone’s rescue after a decade of always being the one in distress. Neither guy realizes their husbands have been conspiring for months– Uriah Crane has already confided in Wynn Gillette, and then some. After being lied to his entire life, Wynn will never allow his nearest and dearest to lie to one another or to themselves. Determined, this time, the truths that need to be revealed match up with fantasies Wynn hungers to live out in reality. Dan’s at his wits’ end. Uriah is lost. Kade is in denial.Wynn is in charge. Rusty Knob visits Pittsburgh in the present, but Polished revisits another Pennsylvania town, in another era– State College, back to where all the secrets and lies began for Dan, Kade, and Uriah at Penn State University.
author: Erica Chilson
